title: Madhur Jaffrey's Indian Cookery
brief_description: Sixteen fabulous foolproof recipes for all those who love the exotic taste of good Indian food. Here at last is a simple, visual guide which shows exactly how you too can achieve these wonderfully subtle and absolutely authentic oriental flavours. Rated: G
